text:
Great front line staff when I asked for Small change for my driver. They even have bellboy at lobby..
Hotel has gymnasium and pool but pool was closed upon my arrival.
Buffet breakfast is provided.
I could have given 5 stars as they didn't reply my email regarding the pool closure.
They have toiletries provided, bath tub and good view of the streets Room was big but Air con is generating too much noise and you can literally hear your neighbor making out in adjoining room. Hotel is near to Windsor food court and easy assess to Nagoya and Penuin area.(BCS and Grandmall)
title: Good value

text:
I don’t give 1/5 reviews. I am only triggered when the cleanliness and hygiene is an issue. 

This hotel gave me a room that I had to walk through a smoke reeked corridor. 
When I went into the room, I got a room that had so much wordless shakes than nods of approval.

1) Toilet was not clean. There was mold.
2) Room had to be “perfumed” with a packet of something hanging on the air con duct 
3) ALL the towels in the room were stained. Asked for a new set and it was STILL stained 😳.
4) No shampoo as a 4 star hotel. 
5) Recycled bed room slippers ( of which I am fine ) but it was stained with dubious stuff. 
6) Room picture hangs precariously over my head.
7) The extra bed I paid extra for came without a bed frame and was placed on the floor. Housekeeping said it is like that 😵‍💫

Management has to do something. The poor housekeeping got a hard time from me 🙏🏻
title: I won’t come back here ever. Sorry.

text:
Without a doubt one of our most favourite hotel in Batam! We had such a lovely 4N5D stay. 

Upon arrival, we were impressed by how beautiful, elegant and cosy the lobby area was. We were warmly welcomed by the reception staffs, which made it a point to make the whole check-in process quick and easy for us when they say how exhausted and sweaty we all were after battling Batam’s merciless heat.

Pros:
-The hotel room was super spacious, we were able to fit an extra bed and still have plenty of space to walk around. 
-The room was made on a daily basis, with the towels regularly changed.
-The room service crew was exceptional, always attending to our needs within short notice. 
-The breakfast spread provided were of good variety,  catering to different tastebuds
-The shuttle service was as advertised, always punctual and efficient

Special shoutout to the lovely receptionist, ECHA! She has such a warm personality and was always serving us with a huge smile on her face. Even when we constantly troubled her with our endless demands over the phone, she remained professional and courteous regardless the time of the day. She should be recognised for being helpful and accommodating. She is a true example of excellent hospitality rendered by a hotel staff! 

While this hotel is ranked as a 4 star hotel, the atmosphere is so special that it really felt like home to all of us. We’ve stayed in fancier hotels across the globe, but were not as impressed with the experience unlike the one we had at Beverly. We almost extended another night but had to leave due to work reasons. 

Thank you Echa and other staffs over at Beverly for going above and beyond to make us feel comfortable. We have no hesitation to recommend your services and hotel to other people. 

Regards,
Raman, Munirah & Umar
title: Excellent hospitality 🥇

text:
We booked this hotel as it was newly renovated (it used to be the Mercure Batam).  Booked the Superior Room for my parents for 1 night and joined them the following day. The first night was in the Superior Room and the second night in the Deluxe Room. We would recommend staying in the deluxe room.  

Deluxe room 212  is clean, spacious and comfortable: good for triple sharing (added 250k IDR for extra bed and breakfast).  Superior Room: my parents found it difficult to control the room temperature, and had to switch off the air-conditioning. 

Towels: Hotel only provides bath towels. Should provide smaller towels as well. 

Bathroom: Superior Room needs proper shower trough for water to drain quickly. The Deluxe Room has a bath tub but no anti-slip mat. This can be dangerous if you travel with elderly relatives or children. When we asked them for a bath mat, they said that they had never heard of this before! I recommend that hotel includes an anti-slip mat for bath tub . 

Service: Staff is helpful and very eager to assist. Prompt. 

Breakfast: Good variety- cereals, salads, Indonesian dishes and sausages/potatoes. I like the jamu drinks. Live cooking station: Staff was overwhelmed by egg requests. Skip the waffles (soggy).  Go early on weekends- difficult to get a seat. 

Lift access and security: Needs to be more closely monitored. It does not offer guest-only access. 

Facilities: Did not try out pool or gym. Hotel has an on-site spa but I did not visit it.

Location: Nothing in the area. Close to Nagoya Hill and BCS mall by car. Walked 7 minutes on uneven road to Pizza Hut. Use the hotel shuttle to Nagoya Hill (10 am and 1 pm). Area is Grab- friendly: use Grab to get to and from Grand Batam mall or to any other area. 

Transport: Hotel provides pickup from Harbour Bay Ferry Terminal at 800k IDR.   We used the 2 way shuttle provided by the spas at Nagoya Hill and BCS mall area respectively.

Overall opinion: Great value: I would stay here again.
title: Clean renovated room and good service : stay in the Deluxe Room
